issue.title: [CI][Java] Use current cookbooks projects to validate new release versions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17073](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17073). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Current there are recipes to validate Arrow components at: <https://github.com/apache/arrow-cookbook>

There are a CI process to create components for new Arrow Java releases: <https://nightlies.apache.org/arrow/java/org/apache/arrow/>

These two projects are working independently.

The purpose of this ticket is to {**}define a way about how to use cookbooks to validate new releases version{**}.

 

`[~jwozniak]` `[~raulcd]` `[~ljw1001]`
